name: Fantasque Sans Mono
desc: A somewhat whimsical monospace font by Jany Belluz.

name: Fantasque Sans Mono Bold
desc: A somewhat whimsical monospace font by Jany Belluz.

name: Hack
desc:
A workhorse font primarily designed for source code,
with focus on legibility. By Source Foundry Authors.

name: Hack Bold
desc:
A workhorse font primarily designed for source code,
with focus on legibility. By Source Foundry Authors.

name: Inconsolata LGC
desc:
A variant of Inconsolata font (originally by Raph Levien)
with addition of Greek and Cyrillic characters.

name: Inconsolata LGC Bold
desc:
A variant of Inconsolata font (originally by Raph Levien)
with addition of Greek and Cyrillic characters.

name: PT Mono 55F
desc: A typewriter font by ParaType with excellent Cyrillic typography.

name: PT Mono 75F
desc: A typewriter font by ParaType with excellent Cyrillic typography.

name: Ubuntu Mono
desc:
A font by Canonical with a very distinct style,
designed for the eponymous Linux distribution.

name: Ubuntu Mono Bold
desc:
A font by Canonical with a very distinct style,
designed for the eponymous Linux distribution.
